title: Business Analyst – Trainer
description:
Simplify Software Experts (www.simplifysoftwareexperts.com) is a rapidly growing information technology service company & fulfilling Recruitment and Contingent staffing (IT & Non-IT) Requirements on a Global Level. We serve you with a highly qualified team that is up-to-date with the latest technologies and operates from India, Germany, the USA, the UK, Canada, Mexico, and other Asian countries in Ecommerce, Finance, Healthcare, Banking, Insurance, and Product/Manufacturing.

100% repeat business (Past 5 years)-Our customers keep coming back to us

80% employee retention (Past 5 years)-Our employees succeed and grow with us

Sustained growth rate of 200% (Past 3 years)-Together we are all progressing

We are growing quickly and need to add dynamic, motivated and talented people to our world-class organization. A startup company; we are growing at an incredible pace and are looking to grow & build our team.

We have an urgent position with our client; below are the Job Details Kindly take a look & let us know your comfort level too.

Job Title: Business Analyst – Trainer

Exp: 3 – 6 Years

Location: Navi Mumbai

Industry: Preferably from a Technology, ITES, Shared Services or Banking organization

Certifications: PMI-BA, CBAP, CCBA, CSBA or similar will be desirable.

Job Description

Experience/ Qualifications


Minimum of 2 years as a Business Analyst
Maximum of 3 years of total experience.


Roles & Responsibilities


Develop training modules and deliver training regarding the business application in both the training centre as well as online.
Ready to travel to various RBI locations across the country as per training requirements.
Perform Requirement Management (Gathering, Analysis, Discussion with Stakeholders, Modelling and Documentation)
Perform feasibility analysis, gap analysis, scope projects, and work with the project management team to prioritize deliverables and negotiate on product functionalities
Own BRD, SRS, User Story, Use Case, User Manual and similar SDLC artefacts
Design and validate functional workflows and write UAT Test cases
Review of Functional documents, Test Plans and Test Cases from external teams
Participate in Integration Testing, User Acceptance Testing and Functionality Testing
Act as a liaison between end-users, technical teams
Sufficient familiarity concerning Agile (SCRUM) and traditional waterfall projects
Partner across stakeholders to identify and consolidate requirements into a single repository for tracking and change management
Proficient in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, Project, PowerPoint and Visio)
Perform other duties as assigned or requested by PMO or IT Project Manager
